name: The Island of the Treasure
description:
The island of the treasure  

Video game created a few years ago  In 2008.   The idea was to create a videogame based on the childhood games of my childhood.   The island of the treasure.  It was to recreate a game of exploration and discovery.   An adventure.  In which the following tracks would reach the long-awaited treasure.    But I would find several obstacles.   Where soon you will discover that the island hides something else.   And the hidden treasure can be your doom or your curse.   In the end I could not finish it.  

But one day I would like to resume the game.   But this time I created it with today's technology.  Maybe using VR virtual reality.   Something that will transport us directly to the island.

Maybe one day I will resume it with help or support ... so that the game can finally be created.

For now it's just an idea.  A project not finished.   A walk around the island.

If someone wanted to support the idea of this game to finally make it happen.   I leave my mail for more contact.

From now enjoy and thank you very much.

E-mail: javiersanchez26@gmail.com 

Digital Porfolio: https://www.behance.net/javiersancda50
